nodes.text: A musical piece was composed by Chris Hülsbeck as the main theme for the Star Wars: Rogue Squadron video game released in 1998. More elaborate and extended versions of Rogue Squadron's theme were used in the game's sequels, Star Wars: Rogue Squadron II: Rogue Leader and Star Wars: Rogue Squadron III: Rebel Strike. These versions were less "computerized" than the original.
In the original game's Concert Hall feature, the theme was only referred to as "Rogue Title."
